name: tom johnathan
introduction: Once upon a time, there was a man named John who had a passion for selling powdered soda. He had a small shop in the heart of the city where he would sell his unique blend of powdered soda to his customers. John’s powdered soda was different from the other sodas available in the market because it was made from natural ingredients and had no artificial flavors or preservatives.
